name: Mung Bean Sprouts Sauteed with Spices (Vegan Gluten Free Breakfast)
description: Mung bean sprouts sauteed with spices. Delicious, quick and healthy, a great way to start the day. Vegan and Gluten Free Breakfast.
recipeIngredient: 1 generous pinch chili flakes or chili powder
fresh cilantro leaves and lemon juice

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, heat a teaspoon of organic canola oil, add 1/4 teaspoon cumin powder or coriander powder, a generous pinch of turmeric and chili flakes or chili powder and cook for half a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, heat a teaspoon of organic canola oil, add 1/4 teaspoon cumin powder or coriander powder, a generous pinch of turmeric and chili flakes or chili powder and cook for half a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in a few tablespoons of chopped onion and saute on medium for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in a few tablespoons of chopped onion and saute on medium for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in chopped tomato(1 tomato) and cook for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in chopped tomato(1 tomato) and cook for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the sprouts, and salt to taste and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the sprouts, and salt to taste and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook on low-medium heat, covered, for 2 to 10 minutes depending on how cooked you want the sprouts to be.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook on low-medium heat, covered, for 2 to 10 minutes depending on how cooked you want the sprouts to be.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot topped with fresh cilantro leaves and lemon juice. with a cup a hot tea.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot topped with fresh cilantro leaves and lemon juice. with a cup a hot tea.

recipeInstructions.text: Other toppings.. chopped cucumber or chopped onions or chopped apple.
recipeInstructions.name: Other toppings.. chopped cucumber or chopped onions or chopped apple.

keywords: easy breakfast, quick breakfast recipe, vegan bean breakfast
